verses.roman:
ei śloka paḍi' prabhu calena vāyu-vege
govinda dhāila pāche, nāhi pāya lāge

synonyms: ei śloka—this verse; paḍi'-reciting; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; calena—goes; vāyu-vege—at the speed of the wind; govinda—Govinda; dhāila—ran; pāche—behind; nāhi pāya lāge—could not catch.
translation: Reciting this verse, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu ran toward the sand dune as fast as the wind. Govinda ran after Him, but he could not approach Him.
